item.title: About
item.description: Top tier living in a middle tier co-op at a bottom tier Silicon Valley mansion. Data engineering @ Facebook’s AML/FAIR. Ex Quora.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Thank you for visiting my very own space on the Internet. Though, it’s of some disappointment that I’m not quite sure what to do with it. You’ll have to forgive me if it looks a bit bare. The current idea is for it to soon look scattered as for a good excuse to buy some furniture. By the end of it, I’m thinking of something like this:

item.title: Some of My Information Sources
item.description: People Some internet people who write about a wide variety of topics and who I regularly learn from. Julia Galef Bret Victor Marc Andreessen Patrick Collison Gwern Dan Luu Dan Wang Mike Bostock Chris Hua Paul Grahm Devon Zuegel Julia Evans Adam D’Angelo Historic Sarah Lacy’s Pando Monthly
